body: lol retard pig who the fuck  throw to te face the tool for hypno shit? just cus NTR mcs are mean to  be more retards but a clever guy  will snatch the phone and beat the shit out of that pig.
Should have grabbed his phone when he pulled it out and stopped the hypnotized everyone and they would have caught him red-handed right in the class.

I think that's his new girlfriend. | Yokota, the fat guy, hates Katou, the MC, for winning university recommendation and the girl he liked (although, I think he won it fair and square). Using hypno app, fat guy put the class in dream, leaving Katou, and fucked his girlfriend. In the end, Katou can't punch him because act of violence would make him lose his chance to university, which he had promised to his girlfriend. In the end, it made him feel weak and guilty for being unable to stop them. Hikaru, the girlfriend, got broken too after being hypnotized many times. She still unconsciously call her boyfriend's name, but the brainwashing seems to stick to her now.
